REM ***** BASIC ***** Option Explicit
Type TTestPass n As Integer x As String End Type
Type TTestFail n As Integer expected As Variant actual As Variant End Type
Global testrun As Boolean
Sub Main test_Test() End Sub
Function _argsStr(fName As String, args As Array) On Local Error Goto JustSomething If fName = "toString" Then ' we cannot use toString if we were just called from there Goto JustSomething End If _argsStr = toString(args) Exit Function JustSomething: _argsStr = " some " & typeOf(args) End Function
Function assertThrows(fName As String, args As Array, Optional errNo As Integer) Dim result As Object Dim fResult As Variant On Local Error Goto Boom testRun = True fResult = applyF(fName, args) testRun = False result = New TTestFail result.expected = IIf(IsMissing(errNo), "an error", "error " & errNo) result.actual = "no error" MsgBox(_ "FAIL: expected fn '" & fName & "' to yield an error on args" & chr(13)_ & _argsStr(fName, args) & chr(13)_ & "returned " & _argsStr(fName, fResult)_ ) assertThrows = result Exit Function Boom: testRun = False If Not(IsMissing(errNo)) Then If (errNo <> Err) Then result = New TTestFail result.expected = "error " & errNo & ": " & toString(Error(errNo)) result.actual = "error " & Err & ": " & toString(Error$) MsgBox("FAIL: expected fn '" & fName & "' to yield" _ & chr(13) & " " & result.expected _ & chr(13) & " not " & result.actual _ & chr(13) & "on args:" _ & chr(13) & _argsStr(fName, args) Else result = New TTestPass result.x = Err & ": " & Error$ End If Else result = New TTestPass result.x = Err & ": " & Error$ End If assertThrows = result End Function
Function assertEqual(actual As Variant, expected As Variant) testRun = True Dim result As Object If Not(actual = expected) Then Set result = New TTestFail result.expected = expected result.actual = actual MsgBox("FAIL: expected " & toString(actual) & chr(13) & " to equal " & toString(expected)) assertEqual = result Else Set result = New TTestPass End If assertEqual = result testRun = False End Function
Function i_will_throw0() Dim foo As Object i_will_throw0 = foo.provoke.an.error End Function
Function test_Test() assertEqual(arityF("i_will_throw0"), 0).x assertThrows("i_will_throw0", Array()).x assertThrows("i_will_throw0", Array(), 91).x assertThrows("i_will_throw0", Array(5)).x End Function
